description: Somali authorities have established a quarantine unit at Aden Adde International Airport (AAIA) in Mogadishu to isolate passengers who demonstrate symptoms of coronavirus.  COVID-19 tests have been required for incoming passengers and they will need to self-isolate for 14 days after arrival in Somalia.
